entry.content: Instead of presenting a culture-wars argument directly, I tried to turn it into [a riddle where you have to come up with the argument yourself](https://malmesbury.substack.com/p/culture-wars-in-riddle-format?sd=pf). This one is about the gender pay gap. Do you think you get a clearer view of the problem when approaching it this way?
